name: Bench at water Elbe
description: Bench at Hamburgs Yacht Harbour with beautiful view on the Elbe and passing Cargoships

name: Bench at water Elbe 2
description: Bench at Hamburgs Yacht Harbour with beautiful view on the Elbe and passing Cargoships

name: Bench at small street in the Forest
description: A bench at a small street infront of an Forest

name: Fummelfelsen / lovers rock
description: This cliff is a beautiful place where people enjoy making out. Watch out for the height and the loose dirt

name: RockwithView
description: Rock with a beautiful view on the water - may be a bit difficult to find

name: Bench in forest water view
description: Beautiful view down a hill in a forest on the water

name: Bench Worbelescheed
description: Beautiful bench in the middle of nowhere

name: cosler kreuz
description: A nice bench in the crossing of 2 streets in a small town

name: Beach in Aachen
description: This is a small beach noone knows and noone ever is. Perfekt for deeptalks with friends, swimming or chilling

name: beach at a sea
description: Lonely sea in the middle of a forest, perfekt place to hang out and bbq with friends

name: Bench in forest
description: Lonely bench at the side of a forest. You can watch horses on the nearby field

name: giant bench
description: This is a giant bench with a Beautiful view. You may need to climb to get up there

name: Bench Buchenberg
description: Bench with a Beautiful view on a hill in front of a field with cows

name: Viewbench Korreite
description: Wonderful bench with a beautiful view on the mountains, in winter or in summer the perfect place to fall in love

name: Bench Isny Bähnle
description: Bench with a nice view on the fields

name: Vier Seen Blick
description: Bench way up in the mountains. Here you can have a beautiful view to the lower land. You will be absolutely alone, up here noone comes

name: Death scare / Todesangst
description: This bench is hard to find but the view and the loneliness is worth the way but be careful

name: Bench "Schöne Aussicht"
description: This bench is way up high in the mountains. Thats why its very lonely and you wont be disturbed here. The perfect place to enjoy the sunset on the horizon which you can perfectly see while sitting on the bench. But be aware you need to go down all the way again. To find it, follow the "Schöne Aussicht" signs on the trail

name: Ightenhill Burnley bench
description: Bench with view of Pendle hill

name: Chimney Banks Bench
description: Bench with view in top of chimney bank, Rosedale, pickering.

name: Neroberg Tempel
description: Schöne Aussicht auf Wiesbaden und die Weinfelder

name: Öresundsbron bench
description: A beautiful bench at the beach with a view to the water

name: Strandvägen view rock
description: Here you can have a wonderful view on the Sea while siting on this scenic viewpoint

name: Rock Garden Bench
description: This bench offers a beautiful view on the nearby forest and rockland

name: Änggarden bench
description: A lonely bench in the middle of a forest with a view on a small lake

name: Ljungheden forest bench
description: Lonely bench in the forest of Ljungheden with a view on a lake

name: Ljungheden forest walk bench
description: One of many benches on this walk through the forest with a wonderful view on a swamp

name: Vindskydd rock beach
description: Rocks at the side of a lake. Wonderful place to take a break or to have a picknick

name: Asbotorpsjön lake jetty
description: Beautiful lake with lots of nice places to stay and fall in love. The jetty is a wonderful place to sit at the first date

name: Asbotorpsjön
description: Lake with lots of places to sit and relax feel free to explore
